entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
